title: House of Pounding Hearts
description: I meant to capture the prince's heart... and ended up with a king's.My desire to sit upon the Lucin throne led me to revive an ancient, winged monarch; one I deemed a friend until that friend duped and imprisoned me.Lorcan claims he’s holding me captive for my own safety, but then he also claims I belong to him. Slumbering for five centuries has evidently given the Crow King severe delusions.We may share an unfortunate mind-link, but we are still masters of our own destiny, and I intend to steer mine away from the Sky Kingdom and its prophecies . . . away from him.I quickly find out there is no escaping the possessive male. In all honesty, I’m no longer certain I want to.
author: Olivia Wildenstein
